posts.title: 1st post
posts.body: This is a sample post describing how people work hard and take breaks. It talks about how we should be careful and avoid trouble, and how people sometimes do wrong things without meaning to.

posts.title: Second post
posts.body: This post also talks about working hard and taking time to relax. It mentions how we must be responsible and avoid problems. This is the second post.

posts.title: Number Three
posts.body: This is the third post. It continues the theme of working, resting, and being careful in life. It reminds us to avoid doing things that can cause harm to others or ourselves.

posts.title: Testing a 4th post
posts.body: Just testing more paragraphs for checking how the posts work.
